name: Intryc
headline: Intryc uses AI to automate quality assurance for customer support
description: Consumer enterprises have millions of customer support tickets annually. They need to constantly evaluate support agents’ performance and compliance. Typically they evaluate less than 5% of those interactions manually which is slow, expensive and not scalable. Intryc's AI can evaluate 100% of all customer interactions, in real time, at half the cost.

founders.name: Alex Marantelos, Co-founder & CEO
founders.description: Co-founder and CEO of Intryc. Previously led Customer Success in Northern Europe for Confluent, overseeing $40M+ in ARR across strategic customers. Worked closely with Confluent's executive team to define everything that touches landing, onboarding, expanding, and renewing customers. Before that, first Enterprise Customer Success Manager in EMEA for Navan (fka TripActions) establishing the EMEA first team and presence.

founders.name: Dimitrios Ilias, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CTO at Intryc. Built the first core banking platform at Revolut; contributed to NLU projects at Alexa/Amazon and AR projects at Meta/Instagram.

founders.name: George Pastakas, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CPO of Intryc. Previously, #1 employee at Pledge (data science and engineeering), led fraud detection at Revolut (ML models, algorithms and operations).

# Use AI to automate quality assurance for customer support
Simplify ticket reviews, boost agent performance, and transform customer experience with actionable insights
[Book a demo](https://intryc.com/<https:/calendly.com/alexmarantel>)[Learn more](https://intryc.com/<#solutions>)
[Reports](https://intryc.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Sampling](https://intryc.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Evaluations](https://intryc.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Coaching](https://intryc.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)[Insights](https://intryc.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-4>)

Backed by leaders who want to provide better customer support
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/674d719e8500f0f696f4503f/67782d5ff9fe06e9a5212dd8_seq.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/674d719e8500f0f696f4503f/675c127214027c844a57d0e3_Albert.webp)
Since adopting Intryc, we've increased our audit output by 40% and enhanced continuous improvement insights by 130%, spanning Product, Support infrastructure, Enablement, and SOPs.The team at Intryc has been an outstanding partner, providing exceptional support throughout the implementation process. We're excited about expanding our collaboration, especially in exploring their evolving AI capabilities.
Albert Luque Strazecki — Associate Director, Operational Excellence, Deel
The Intryc egde
## Full ticket insights at lightning speed
Intryc ensures you cover 100% of your tickets with no extra work, so you can boost feedback timelines and elevate customer support quality consistently.
[With Intryc](https://intryc.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-0>)[Without Intryc](https://intryc.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-1>)
## See Intryc’s full potential
Discover how business use Intryc to enhance support with smarter QA tools

Role based Solutions
## From Agent to Lead, every role gets the tools to thrive
Intryc ensures each team member has what they need to drive quality, improve processes, and deliver outstanding customer experiences.
CS Quality Assurance Lead
Set the gold standard for service excellence by ensuring your team delivers consistent, impactful quality across every customer interaction
[View all features](https://intryc.com/</product/qa-admin>)
QA Leads reduce time to set up, sample, distribute, and manage workloads by more than 80% at Intryc
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/674d719e8500f0f696f4503f/6762f4c45314345bf04e31bf_knowledge-base%202%402x.webp)

Transform every customer interaction into a moment of trust, satisfaction, and lasting impact

Support Agents see improvements in performance & customer satisfaction

Empower support agents to consistently deliver high-quality, helpful support that enhances every customer experience

QA Specialists reduce evaluation time by more than 50% with Intryc.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/674d719e8500f0f696f4503f/67569fff307465d0d4064db0_QA%20Specialist.avif)

## Integrate fast.Evaluate faster.

Connect your help desk and organisation knowledge base seamlessly in under 10 minutes

Set & Customize
Design your own intelligent sampling, custom scorecards, and tailored workloads based on your organisation's rules and needs

Security you can trust
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/674d719e8500f0f696f4503f/674f7530aebed43ce66da730_Security.svg)

Intryc is the most flexible and dynamic QA tool I've ever worked with. Since implementing it, we've reduced time spent on mundane tasks like ticket selection by 90%—which is even more impressive given the high complexity of our ticket ownership workflows.The Intryc team's exceptional support and dedication to customizing the product for our needs have been invaluable. They made the impossible possible. Huge thanks to the team!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/674d719e8500f0f696f4503f/675c482318fc9817d48f9faa_Thomas%20Kolovos.jpeg)
Thomas Kolovos
QA Team Lead at Blueground
Intryc offers an optimal combination of flexibility, real time workload distribution, intelligent automation, and ease of use which enable us to streamline our operations and increase the efficiency of our QA team, giving us a competitive edge.Compared to other established solutions we’ve used in the past, which lacked dynamic features and had cumbersome reporting, Intryc stands out by addressing the key needs of a modern QA team.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/674d719e8500f0f696f4503f/675c4815723cfd5476d7a87f_Jorge%20Portillo.webp)
Jorge Portillo
QA Lead, Operational Excellence at Deel
Since adopting Intryc, we've increased our audit output by 40% and enhanced continuous improvement insights by 130%, spanning Product, Support infrastructure, Enablement, and SOPs.The team at Intryc has been an outstanding partner, providing exceptional support throughout the implementation process. We're excited about expanding our collaboration, especially in exploring their evolving AI capabilities.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/674d719e8500f0f696f4503f/675c127214027c844a57d0e3_Albert.webp)
Albert Luque Strazecki
Associate Director, Operational Excellence, Deel
Key Features
### We make improving your customer support easy. 
Traditional QA methods are time-consuming and limited, providing only partial insights that slow down feedback or consistent, data-driven improvements.
[View all features](https://intryc.com/<#>)
## [SamplingStop wasting hours on sampling. Use your custom rules, tags, and other attributes from your data sources and SOPs and set up statistically significant samples in minutes, not hours.](https://intryc.com/<#w-tabs-3-data-w-pane-0>)## [Evaluations with AIBreak through that 5% ticket sample ceiling. Train your own AI QA to your knowledge-base and SOP achieve up to 100% coverage across all scorecards, criteria, and tickets with Intryc's powerful AI.](https://intryc.com/<#w-tabs-3-data-w-pane-1>)## [Customisable scorecardsYour scorecard, your rules. No limits on the number of scorecards, criteria, or context included in each to ensure a world-class QA program.](https://intryc.com/<#w-tabs-3-data-w-pane-2>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/674d719e8500f0f696f4503f/6764272ed1bdadf1b9026d22_Tab%201.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/674d719e8500f0f696f4503f/6764272e0c1ea2f67fa7f475_Tab%202.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/674d719e8500f0f696f4503f/6764272e036316ccac3762c3_Tab%203.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/674d719e8500f0f696f4503f/6750661879a6bd789e07ca57_Noise%20BG.webp)
Proactive insights
## Know exactly what’s working and what needs attention
Intryc brings your ticket metadata together, triggering real-time alerts for any spikes or pressing issues that need immediate attention.
[View all features](https://intryc.com/</product/monitoring/insights>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/674d719e8500f0f696f4503f/674ffc4e83628fa6f93e4456_Intuitive%20Highlights.webp)
## Stay on top of everything
Get a high-level overview of your recent tickets and stay informed about everything happening at a glance.
## Receive real-time notifications
See instant alerts for any spikes or emerging issues, empowering you to respond swiftly and keep your service quality top-notch.
## Analyse data by key metrics
Segment data by country, product, or topic to get focused insights that matter the most to your business, without the hassle of digging.
## Effortless issue summaries
Read concise summaries, user quotes, and ticket samples to have a deep understanding of root causes.
Spotlight Features
## Deliver consistent quality, no matter the ticket load
Traditional QA methods are manual, time-consuming, and cover only a fraction of tickets or scorecards. This limits insights and slows down improvements in your team’s performance and customer experience.
[Performance AnalyticsAI-driven insights on key topics, product areas, agent performance, and customer service processes from your entire ticket base](https://intryc.com/<#w-tabs-4-data-w-pane-0>)[Agent CoachingEnable tailored coaching with evaluations based on your scorecards’ rating and feedback](https://intryc.com/<#w-tabs-4-data-w-pane-1>)[Detailed Ticket ViewAccess complete ticket metadata, across side conversations, internal notes, and ticket events to enable end-to-end evaluations for complete performance reviews.](https://intryc.com/<#w-tabs-4-data-w-pane-2>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/674d719e8500f0f696f4503f/6759d45b6bc640f37eef0426_Tickets%20_%20Detailed%20viewss%203.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/674d719e8500f0f696f4503f/675031ba1affd684b454e96c_Agent%20Coaching.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/674d719e8500f0f696f4503f/675030d66bf206043e709bd6_Ticket%20View.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/674d719e8500f0f696f4503f/6750661879a6bd789e07ca57_Noise%20BG.webp)
## Turn your customer support into your growth engine.
Optimize your support team’s performance with Intryc to fuel business growth and stay ahead in the market
[Book a demo](https://intryc.com/<https:/calendly.com/alexmarantel>)[Learn more](https://intryc.com/</#solutions>)

generated_description:
### Overview of Intryc

Intryc, a company founded in 2023 and based in San Francisco, is shaking up the customer support quality assurance (QA) landscape by leveraging AI technology. As a fresh entrant into the startup ecosystem, Intryc is part of the Y Combinator Batch S24, indicating it's on a promising trajectory.

### Mission

Intryc aims to automate the quality assurance process for customer support teams. Many enterprises face the challenge of managing millions of customer support tickets annually, yet they only manually evaluate a small fraction—typically less than 5%. This traditional approach is slow, expensive, and lacks scalability. By harnessing AI, Intryc transforms this process by enabling real-time evaluation of 100% of customer interactions at half the cost.

### Team and Leadership

The company is compact, with a dedicated team of just nine employees. It has Tom Blomfield as a Group Partner, bringing additional weight to its advisory board with his experience in tech and entrepreneurship.

### Features and Offerings

Intryc's offerings are robust and designed to cater to various roles within customer support:

1. **Quality Assurance**: The core focus of Intryc is to provide comprehensive QA tools that allow customer support leads and teams to ensure consistent service quality.
   
2. **Real-Time Insights**: The platform enables businesses to monitor important incidents on calls and gain in-depth insights into all activities.

3. **Role-Based Solutions**: 
   - **CS Quality Assurance Lead**: Sets service standards and monitors team performance.
   - **Support Agent**: Works to enhance customer interactions, turning them into moments of trust.
   - **QA Specialist**: Focuses on training and providing high-quality support.
   - **Support Agent Team Lead**: Ensures that the team meets and exceeds customer expectations consistently.

### Key Features

- **AI-Powered Evaluations**: Breaks through the limitations of manual sampling and enables full ticket coverage.
- **Customizable Scorecards**: Allows businesses to define their own rules for quality evaluations, ensuring relevancy and effectiveness.
- **Proactive Insights**: Offers alerts and real-time data analysis to identify trends and issues before they escalate.

These features collectively position Intryc as a leader in the automation of customer support QA, making it easier for companies to improve service and reduce operational burdens.

### Testimonials and Impact

Intryc is already gaining traction, with partners like Deel attesting to impressive results such as a 40% increase in audit output and significant improvements in continuous insights. The feedback underscores Intryc’s role not just as a tool, but as a valuable partner in ensuring enhanced customer experiences.

### Conclusion

Intryc represents an innovative approach to a perennial problem in customer support: ensuring quality without overwhelming resources. With its AI-driven solutions, this startup is poised to redefine industry standards, making quality assurance faster, cheaper, and substantially more effective.

For more information, visit their website [Intryc.com](https://intryc.com).
